    MaximumFinder is the main class for printing the 3rd maximum number in list of 10 numbers It uses the InputReader and Validator class for the userInput and the Validation process Used the log4j2 for the outputs.

    Validator
    Validator class is used to validate the input whether it is a valid input or not and stores them into an integer array It reads 10 numbers from the user, validates them, and returns the validated integer array
